item.title: A16Z大卫·乔治谈私募与公募市场如何融合为一体
item.description:
为何企业不急于上市。

【原文：

Why companies don't feel the rush to IPO.

】

item.title: 欧元区商业活动因德国制造业复苏而上升
item.description: 欧元区私营部门活动表现超出预期，得益于德国制造业意外增长，该领域创下2022年以来最佳表现。【原文：Private-sector activity in the euro area surpassed expectations as manufacturers recorded their best performance since 2022 thanks to surprise growth in Germany.】

item.title: 零散股：A16Z乔治谈私募市场爆发式增长（播客）
item.description: 零散股：A16Z乔治谈私募市场爆发式增长（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: A16Z’s George on Huge Private Market Growth (Podcast)】

item.title: 油轮运费飙升，伊朗风险或推高运费
item.description: 随着美国对伊朗发动重大军事打击的风险日益加剧，加之油轮所有权日益集中，租用超级油轮的成本可能将攀升至本十年最高水平。【原文：The cost to hire oil supertankers could be headed for the highest levels this decade on the growing risk of a major US attack on Iran, and as ownership of the vessels becomes more concentrated.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织对莫桑比克债务危机和预算危机发出警告
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，莫桑比克正面临财政危机，并已拖欠众多双边和多边贷款机构的债务偿还款项，这幅描绘该东南非国家饱受重创的经济状况的图景令人沮丧。【原文：Mozambique is navigating a fiscal crisis and has built up debt-servicing arrears with a raft of bilateral and multilateral lenders, the International Monetary Fund said, painting a bleak picture of the southeast African nation’s battered economy.】

item.title: 德国制造业自2022年以来首次实现增长
item.description: 德国制造业自2022年以来首次实现增长，庞大的政府支出提振了欧洲最大经济体。【原文：Germany’s manufacturing sector grew for the first time since 2022 as vast government outlays buoy Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 印度债券下跌，因原油上涨加剧通胀担忧
item.description: 印度债券创下两周来最大跌幅，因原油价格上涨加剧了这个燃料进口国的通胀担忧。【原文：Indian bonds fell the most in two weeks as a rise in crude prices fanned inflation concerns in the fuel-importing nation.】

item.title: 中国抢购印度弃置的俄罗斯困境原油货运
item.description: 中国炼油厂正大量收购印度拒绝的俄罗斯原油，这帮助莫斯科克服了印度采购量下滑的困境——印度通常是俄罗斯海运原油的最大买家。【原文：Chinese refiners are snapping up Russian oil that India is shunning, helping Moscow to overcome a dip in purchases by the country that’s normally its biggest buyer of seaborne barrels.】

item.title: 美国银行抗拒塞甘蒂律师要求共享文件
item.description: 对冲基金Segantii Capital Management及其创始人——人称"大宗交易之王"——的辩护律师正力争让美国银行的关键文件获准在法庭上呈堂，这为香港近年最受瞩目的案件之一奠定了基础。【原文：Defense lawyers for hedge fund Segantii Capital Management and its founder — widely known as the “block trade king” — are pressing for key documents from Bank of America Corp. to be admitted in court, setting the stage for one of Hong Kong’s highest-profile cases in recent memory.】

item.title: 策略师称欧洲股市新高将出现在2026年
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，今年尚未进入三月，策略师们就表示本周欧洲股市创下的历史新高，对投资者而言已是今年能达到的最佳水平。【原文：It’s not even March yet and strategists are saying this week’s record high for European stocks is as good as things will get for investors this year, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 法国商业活动因制造业下滑受阻
item.description: 法国商业活动收缩在本月有所缓解，但制造业意外疲软拖累了整体表现。【原文：The contraction in French business activity eased this month but surprise weakness in the manufacturing sector weighed.】

item.title: 丹麦经济几乎停滞，制药业下滑抵消了更广泛的增长
item.description: 去年年底，丹麦经济几乎停滞不前，诺和诺德公司主导的制药业陷入低迷，拖累了整体经济增长。【原文：Denmark’s economy barely expanded at the end of last year as a slump in the pharmaceutical industry, dominated by Novo Nordisk A/S, weighed on overall growth.】

item.title: 金斯潘借数据中心热潮创下历史最高营收
item.description: 建筑公司金斯潘集团（Kingspan Group Plc）创下历史最高营收纪录，其数据中心业务蓬勃发展，抵消了住宅领域业务的疲软表现。【原文：Construction firm Kingspan Group Plc generated record revenue as its data center business mushroomed, offsetting weaker activity in the residential sector.】

item.title: 迪拜顶级银行加速进军亚洲市场，资金流动激增
item.description: 阿联酋国民银行（Emirates NBD Bank PJSC）正扩大其在亚洲的业务版图，随着中东与快速增长的亚洲市场之间资本流动的加速，该行正积极拓展市场布局。【原文：Emirates NBD Bank PJSC is expanding its footprint in Asia as capital flows between the Middle East and fast-growing Asian markets gather pace.】

item.title: 淡马锡与阿布扎比投资局拟投资Clean Max印度IPO
item.description: 知情人士透露，淡马锡控股与阿布扎比投资局计划投资清洁马克斯环保能源解决方案有限公司的首次公开募股，此举将为这场考验印度市场情绪的上市计划提供支持。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte and Abu Dhabi Investment Authority are planning to invest in the initial public offering of Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, giving support to a listing that will test market sentiment in India.】

item.title: 阿斯顿·马丁再次下调利润预期，关税冲击显现
item.description: 阿斯顿·马丁拉贡达全球控股公司再次发布盈利预警，凸显了加拿大亿万富翁劳伦斯·斯特罗尔试图扭转这家陷入困境的豪华汽车制造商颓势所面临的挑战。【原文：Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc issued another profit warning, underscoring the challenge facing Canadian billionaire Lawrence Stroll as he tries to turn around the ailing luxury-car maker.】

item.title: 英美资源集团对戴比尔斯钻石业务计提23亿美元减值损失
item.description: 英美资源集团旗下陷入困境的戴比尔斯公司再次计提减值准备，尽管钻石业务持续拖累盈利，但集团整体仍实现稳定盈利。【原文：Anglo American Plc took yet another writedown on its struggling De Beers unit and reported steady profits as its diamond operations continued to weigh on earnings.】

item.title: 英国零售额飙升至20个月来最快增速
item.description: 英国零售业销售额以20个月来最快增速开启新年，这一意外增长可能助力工党政府振兴经济的努力。【原文：UK retail sales started the year with the fastest growth in 20 months, an unexpected surge that could boost the Labour government’s efforts to revive the economy.】

item.title: 英国创下史上最大预算盈余，税收收入激增
item.description: 英国创下史上最高预算盈余纪录，公共财政迎来丰收月，这得益于资本利得税收入激增以及债务偿还额下降。【原文：Britain recorded the biggest budget surplus on record as a bumper month for the public finances was augmented by a surge in inflows of capital gains tax and lower debt payments.】

item.title: 西班尼在贵金属价格反弹后恢复派息
item.description: 西班尼·斯蒂尔沃特有限公司将在贵金属价格去年上涨后，支付自2023年以来的首次股息。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. will pay its first dividend since 2023, after prices of the precious metals it produces rallied last year.】

item.title: 印度监管机构就资金挪用指控对Zee展开调查
item.description: 印度市场监管机构已向Zee娱乐企业有限公司及其管理层发出说明原因通知书，重启了关于资金挪用和治理失当的指控，这些问题曾导致该公司与索尼影视网络印度公司的合并计划告吹。【原文：India’s market regulator has issued a show-cause notice to Zee Entertainment Enterprises Ltd. and its leadership, reviving allegations of fund diversion and governance lapses that derailed its planned merger Sony Pictures Networks India.】

item.title: 英国1月零售额增幅超预期
科技股抛售似有过度之嫌，澳大利亚养老基金首席投资官表示
item.description: 澳大利亚最大养老基金之一UniSuper的首席投资官对全球科技股下跌的担忧不以为然，称该领域的支出可支撑市场其他板块。【原文：The chief investment officer of UniSuper, one of Australia’s largest pension funds, is brushing aside concerns about the downturn in global tech stocks, saying that spending in the sector can support other parts of the market.】

item.title: 印度人工智能相关股价飙升，莫迪与阿尔特曼、阿莫代亲密会晤
item.description: 印度数据中心相关股票本周强势上涨，因该国总理纳伦德拉·莫迪在OpenAI首席执行官山姆·阿尔特曼和Anthropic PBC首席执行官达里奥·阿莫代伊的见证下，重申了印度成为全球人工智能枢纽的雄心。【原文：Indian data center–related shares rallied this week, as the country’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi reiterated its ambition to emerge as a global hub for AI in the presence of OpenAI’s Sam Altman and Anthropic PBC’s Dario Amodei.】

item.title: 拉加德称其"基本预期"是完成欧洲央行任期，《华尔街日报》报道
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜·拉加德表示，她基本打算完成欧洲央行行长的任期，此前有报道称她将提前卸任。【原文：Christine Lagarde said her base case is to see out her term as European Central Bank president, following a report this week that she’ll step down early.】

item.title: 中国初创企业的功夫机器人点燃了对科技持谨慎态度的投资者的热情
item.description: 在中国的年度春节联欢晚会上，机器人再次成为焦点，它们出现在喜剧小品中，随着华语流行乐起舞，还像武术大师般在墙壁上弹跳。尽管大盘整体走低，投资者周五仍纷纷买入机器人公司股票。【原文：Robots once again stole the show during China’s annual Spring Festival gala, popping up in comedy skits, dancing to Mandarin pop and bouncing off walls like martial arts masters. Investors responded Friday by pushing up shares in robotics firms even as the broader market sagged.】

item.title: 印度2月经济活动加速，采购经理人指数显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司的初步调查显示，随着美国大幅削减对印度商品的关税，印度市场情绪好转，该国2月份经济活动加速。【原文：India’s economic activity accelerated in February as sentiment improved after the US slashed tariffs on Indian goods, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 沙特对印石油供应激增，缩小与最大供应国俄罗斯的差距
item.description: 印度本月将从沙特阿拉伯进口逾六年来的最大规模原油，此前这个南亚国家持续面临美国施压，要求其减少购买俄罗斯原油。【原文：India is set to import the most crude from Saudi Arabia in more than six years this month, as the South Asian nation faces sustained US pressure to reduce purchases of Russian barrels.】

item.title: 马来西亚1月出口增速创逾三年新高
item.description: 马来西亚投资、贸易和工业部周五公布的数据显示，受电子产品出货量激增推动，该国1月份出口增速创下逾三年新高。【原文：Malaysian exports, driven by a surge in electronics shipments, rose at the fastest pace in over three years in January, according to data released by the Ministry of Investment, Trade and Industry on Friday.】

item.title: 收益率飙升吸引日本债券1月资金流入接近纪录高位
item.description: 上月海外投资者购入日本国债的规模创历史第二高，因收益率上升抵消了政府支出激增的风险。【原文：Overseas investors purchased the second-largest amount of Japanese government bonds on record last month, as higher yields compensated buyers for the risk of a blowout in government spending.】
